class accounts.models.Assignment(id, username, num, course, Assignment, extensions)[source]¶

Bases: django.db.models.base.Model

Assignment¶

The descriptor for the file attribute on the model instance. Return a FieldFile when accessed so you can write code like:

>>> from myapp.models import MyModel
>>> instance = MyModel.objects.get(pk=1)
>>> instance.file.size

Assign a file object on assignment so you can do:

>>> with open('/path/to/hello.world') as f:
...     instance.file = File(f)

Submission¶

The descriptor for the file attribute on the model instance. Return a FieldFile when accessed so you can write code like:

>>> from myapp.models import MyModel
>>> instance = MyModel.objects.get(pk=1)
>>> instance.file.size

Assign a file object on assignment so you can do:

>>> with open('/path/to/hello.world') as f:
...     instance.file = File(f)

save()[source]¶

Save the current instance. Override this in a subclass if you want to control the saving process.

The ‘force_insert’ and ‘force_update’ parameters can be used to insist that the “save” must be an SQL insert or update (or equivalent for non-SQL backends), respectively. Normally, they should not be set.

user¶

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a one-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Restaurant(Model):
    place = OneToOneField(Place, related_name='restaurant')

Restaurant.place is a ForwardOneToOneDescriptor instance.

accounts.urls module¶

accounts.views module¶

class accounts.views.SignUpView(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: django.views.generic.edit.CreateView

form_class¶

alias of django.contrib.auth.forms.UserCreationForm

success_url¶
template_name = 'accounts/signup.html'¶
accounts.views.assignments(request)[source]¶

if user is student,shows all assignments and submissions of the user else requests logout

accounts.views.assigns_215(request)[source]¶

redirects to assign.html if identity is teacher else requests logout

accounts.views.assigns_251(request)[source]¶

redirects to assign.html if identity is teacher else requests logout

accounts.views.assigns_293(request)[source]¶

redirects to assign.html if identity is teacher else requests logout

accounts.views.course(request)[source]¶

if user is teacher and form is valid ,creates course and redirects to home page of user

accounts.views.course_215(request)[source]¶

if user is teacher requests logouts else redirects to courtse.html

accounts.views.course_251(request)[source]¶

if user is teacher requests logouts else redirects to courtse.html

accounts.views.course_293(request)[source]¶

if user is teacher requests logouts else redirects to courtse.html

accounts.views.courseview(request)[source]¶

if user is student,shows his course stats else requests logout

accounts.views.grade(request, course)[source]¶

if user is not teacher requests logout else grade the assignments of students

accounts.views.home(request)[source]¶

if user is authenticated redirects to home page from login page else stays in login page

accounts.views.home_t(request)[source]¶

if user is authenticated and teacher redirects to home page of teacher

accounts.views.index(request)[source]¶

if user is authenticated rediects to home page else to login page

accounts.views.login_user(request)[source]¶

checks the details in login page and redirects to its desired home page

accounts.views.logout_user(request)[source]¶

requests to logout

accounts.views.new_upload(request)[source]¶

if form is valid submits assignment for newly created courses and redirects to home page else requests logout

accounts.views.new_upload_t(request)[source]¶

if identity is teacher and form is valid creates a new assignment for newly created courses ,and redirects to home else requests logout

accounts.views.profile(request)[source]¶

if user is authenticated redirects to profile page

accounts.views.register(request)[source]¶

if user in not authenticated registers the user details and next redirects login page

accounts.views.submissions(request)[source]¶

if user is teacher,redirects to the submissions page of students

accounts.views.upload_book(request)[source]¶

if submission form is valid submits assignment and redirects to home page else requests logout

accounts.views.upload_book_t(request)[source]¶

if identity is teacher and form is valid creates a new assignment for default courses,and redirects to home else requests logout

accounts.views.view(request)[source]¶

if user is authenticated and student ,shows his course stats else requests logout

accounts.views.vsc(request)[source]¶

if user is not teacher requests logout else returns the response of the teacher
